Get Flash Player                                          Strawberry Festival's 30th Anniversary celebration! Join NYU's community of students, staff and faculty for a day of wellness, community, and of course, strawberries! This street fair includes carnival games, give-a-ways, interactive booths, live music, and NYC's longest strawberry shortcake.   Strawberry Festival is sponsored by the Program Board at NYU .   Date: Friday, May 8, 2015     Location: LaGuardia Place (btwn West 3rd St and Washington Square South)   Time: 12:30 p.m. - 4:30 p.m.                                                                                                                                                                 NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Join NYU's community of students, staff and faculty for a day of wellness, community, and of course, strawberries! This street fair includes carnival games, give-a-ways, interactive booths, live music, and NYC's longest strawberry shortcake.   Strawberry Festival is sponsored by the Program Board at NYU . Learn. Connect. Celebrate.           On Friday, March 6th and Saturday, March 7th, NYU will host the 4th annual NYU Entrepreneurs Festival, where over 1,000 members of the NYU entrepreneurial community come together to connect, collaborate and celebrate entrepreneurs from across the University. The event includes, keynotes, panels, roundtables and a venture showcase—featuring over 70 speakers—as well as a big celebratory party. Our keynote speakers include Mark Leslie (CAS), General Managing Partner of Leslie Ventures, Jason Finger (Law/Stern), Co-Founder and CEO of Seamless, and Jonathan Wolfson, (Law/Stern) Co-Founder and CEO of Solazyme.          Click here to see a detailed agenda for our Festival on March 6 & 7, 2015.      So many entrepreneurs have launched their stories while studying at NYU.
